channel.title: Fukui Pref. on Misa's Odekake Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Fukui Pref. on Misa's Odekake Blog

item.title: Tojinbo Cliffs
item.description: Speaking of the place where the criminals are cornered by detectives in Japanese suspense dramas is Tojinbo. It is sightseeing spot cliffs on the sea. I went there. We can watch the cliffs from above, but I was afraid, so I didn’t get too close. If I carelessly fall down, I will possibly die. Then, I decided to take a boat tour, and I watched the cliffs from below. The
